TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentDesigner extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITreeDesigner, class System.IDisposable
Public Class ComponentDesigner Implements IComponentInitializer, IDesigner, IDesignerFilter, IDisposable, ITreeDesigner
type ComponentDesigner = class interface ITreeDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IDesignerFilter interface IComponentInitializer

summary.span: 擴充元件的設計模式行為。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底設計工具的類別提供一種簡單的設計工具，可以擴充的相關聯的元件在設計模式中的行為。The base designer class provides a simple designer that can extend the behavior of an associated component in design mode. 提供空白介面的實作，可以覆寫其方法，以在設計階段調整屬性、 屬性和事件的相關聯的元件。 provides an empty interface implementation, whose methods can be overridden to adjust the attributes, properties and events of the associated component at design time. 您可以將設計工具與型別，使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 如需自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱 < [ 擴充設計階段支援](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design-time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). 類別會實作繼承元件的屬性描述元的特殊行為。The class implements a special behavior for the property descriptors of inherited components. 名為內部型別`InheritedPropertyDescriptor`預設會使用實作，以代表繼承自基底類別的屬性。An internal type named `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` is used by the default implementation to stand in for properties that are inherited from a base class. 有兩種情況下加入這些屬性描述項中。There are two cases in which these property descriptors are added. 1. 所傳回的根物件本身，屬性，因為您繼承自其基底類別。To the root object itself, which is returned by the property, because you are inheriting from its base class. 2. 在根物件的基底類別中找到的欄位。To fields found in the base class of the root object. 從基底類別的 public 和 protected 欄位都會加入至設計工具中，以便它們可以由使用者操作。Public and protected fields from the base class are added to the designer so that they can be manipulated by the user. `InheritedPropertyDescriptor`類別修改預設屬性的值，而預設值是目前的值，在物件具現化。The `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` class modifies the default value of a property, so that the default value is the current value at object instantiation. 這是因為屬性繼承自另一個執行個體。This is because the property is inherited from another instance. 設計工具定義重設的屬性值，因為繼承的類別將它設定為值的設定。The designer defines resetting the property value as setting it to the value that was set by the inherited class. 此值可能不同於儲存在中繼資料中的預設值。This value may differ from the default value stored in metadata. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供範例實作與設計工具相關聯的範例元件。The following code example provides an example implementation and an example component associated with the designer. 設計工具會實作覆寫方法來呼叫基底`Initialize`方法，覆寫方法，以顯示按兩下元件時，並覆寫的提供自訂的屬性存取子元件的快顯功能表的功能表命令。The designer implements an override of the method that calls the base `Initialize` method, an override of the method that displays a when the component is double-clicked, and an override of the property accessor that supplies a custom menu command to the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CPP/examplecomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CS/examplecomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/VB/examplecomponent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得元件集合，該集合與設計工具管理的元件相關聯。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 元件，與設計工具管理的元件相關聯。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指示任何複製或移動複本，在設計工具所管理的元件以及元件拖曳，或移動作業。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果這個集合包含目前的設計模式文件中的其他元件的參考，這些元件以及元件設計工具管理複製作業期間複製。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 選取設計工具所管理的元件時，這個集合會填入任何巢狀控制項。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合也可以包含其他元件，例如工具列的按鈕。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的設定這個屬性。The method of sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 當覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，然後再使用這個屬性。When overriding the method, be sure to call the base class method before using this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

abstract member DoDefaultAction : unit -> unit override this.DoDefaultAction : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在元件上預設事件的原始程式碼檔案中建立方法簽章，並將使用者的游標巡覽至該位置。

span.span: Creates a method signature in the source code file for the default event on the component and navigates the user's cursor to that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Form 和 Web Form 設計工具中，當使用者按兩下元件時，會叫用這個方法。In Windows Forms and Web Forms designers, this method is invoked when a user double-clicks a component.

exception.span: 要將已經簽入原始程式碼管理程式的某個檔案簽出時失敗。

span.span: An attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 藉由在記憶體回收收回物件前呼叫 的方法，嘗試釋放資源。

span.span: Attempts to free resources by calling before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作會要求服務從元件的站台。The default implementation of this method requests the service from the site of the component. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法來存取設計工具服務。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to access designer services. summary.span: 重新初始化現有的元件。

span.span: Reinitializes an existing component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當重新初始化現有的元件，時，會呼叫方法。The method is called when an existing component is being reinitialized. 比方說，這可能會發生之後的使用者會將元件拖曳至另一個容器。For example, this may occur after the user drags a component to another container. 您可以使用`defaultValues`字典來套用建議預設屬性; 不過，您不應該修改元件屬性除了儲存在字典中，因為這個現有的元件可能已在其上設定的屬性。You may use the `defaultValues` dictionary to apply recommended defaults to properties; however, you should not modify component properties aside from those stored in the dictionary, because this existing component may already have properties set on it. 這個方法的預設實作會執行任何動作。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

span.span: A name/value dictionary of default values to apply to properties.

summary.span: 初始化新建立的元件。

span.span: Initializes a newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件第一次初始化時，通常第一次新增至設計介面之後，呼叫方法。The method is called when a component is first initialized, typically after being first added to a design surface. 您可能會執行任何必要的初始化這個元件，因此您可以忽略`defaultValues`字典完全。You may perform any necessary initialization of this component, and you may ignore the `defaultValues` dictionary altogether. 這個方法的預設實作會執行任何動作。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

summary.span: 初始化已初始化為預設值以外設定的匯入元件設定。

span.span: Initializes the settings for an imported component that is already initialized to settings other than the defaults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與不在其預設狀態，例如您貼上或拖曳至設計工具拖放作業移動控制項的控制項相關聯設計工具時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the designer is associated with a control that is not in its default state, such as a control that you paste or move with a drag-and-drop operation onto the designer. 這個方法提供的機會，以便實作器會修改或陰影元件的屬性，而非初始化為其預設值元件的屬性。This method provides an opportunity for implementers to modify or shadow the properties of the component rather than initialize the properties for the component to their defaults. 之後的初始化函式會呼叫這個方法。This method is called after the other initialization functions.

summary.span: 設定元件的預設屬性。

span.span: Sets the default properties for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化設計工具時呼叫。 is called when the designer is initialized. 這可讓設計工具，以提供基底元件的預設值。This allows the designer to provide default values for the base component. 這個方法只呼叫一次： 當您第一次建立元件從 [工具箱] 拖曳至設計介面。This method is called only once: when you first create the component by dragging it from the Toolbox to the design surface. 後續的初始化設計工具不會叫用這個方法。Subsequent initializations of the designer do not invoke this method. 如果預設屬性是一個字串，而且未設定的屬性，這個方法的預設實作會設定元件的預設屬性的元件名稱。The default implementation of this method sets the default property of the component to the name of the component if the default property is a string and the property is not already set. 若要自訂此設計工具正在設計的元件初始化衍生類別中，就可以實作這個方法。This method can be implemented in a derived class to customize the initialization of the component that this designer is designing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ParentComponent As IComponent
protected: virtual property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ ParentComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個設計工具的父元件。

span.span: Gets the parent component for this designer.

value.span: 此設計工具的父元件；若此設計工具是根元件，則為 。

span.span: The parent component for this designer, or if this designer is the root component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供一般的機制，可供探索父系的關聯性，在設計工具，而且會由物件的介面實作。This property provides a generic mechanism for discovering parent relationships within designers, and is used by the object's interface implementation. 這個屬性應該只傳回`null`當這個設計工具是根元件。This property should only return `null` when this designer is the root component. 這個屬性的預設實作會傳回不是根元件的所有元件的根元件，則會傳回`null`根元件。The default implementation of this property returns the root component for all components that are not the root component, and it returns `null` for the root component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed

param.name: attributes

summary.span: 允許設計工具變更或移除它經由 公開的屬性集中的項目。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來變更或移除透過公開的屬性字典內的項目。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of attributes that are exposed through a . 中的屬性字典的索引鍵是屬性的值所指定的型別識別項，其屬性。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 物件是類型。The objects are of type . 這個方法之後，立即呼叫方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 您可以直接篩選字典可透過存取參數，或者您可以將它保留不變。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果您覆寫這個方法，請在執行您自己的篩選之後呼叫的基底實作。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，您必須移除中的項目方法。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 相反地，變更屬性，以隱藏項目。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 您可能也會移除中的項目方法。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得與設計工具相關元件所支援的設計階段動詞命令 (Verb)。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs supported by the component that is associated with the designer.

value.span: 物件的 ，或 (如果沒有可用的設計工具動詞命令)。

span.span: A of objects, or if no designer verbs are available.

value.span: 這個預設的實作 (Implementation) 永遠傳回 。

span.span: This default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`null`如果元件沒有設計階段動詞命令。This method returns `null` if the component has no design-time verbs. 設計階段環境通常會顯示捷徑 （右鍵） 功能表中，這個方法所傳回的動詞命令。The design-time environment typically displays verbs returned by this method in a shortcut (right-click) menu. 當使用者選取其中一個指令動詞，方法的對應叫用。When a user selects one of the verbs, the method of the corresponding is invoked. > [!NOTE] > 設計階段環境通常會提供**屬性**元件的捷徑功能表上。A design-time environment typically provides a **Properties** command on a component's shortcut menu. 因此，不包含這類項目中指定設計工具的動詞命令的集合。Therefore, do not include such an entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
